lines.text: Well, it appears that you just can't stay out of my bedroom.

[watching TV news of a bomb disarm with Col. Forsyth]
There's your bomber.
Forsyth. You?re crazy. Why would he build a bomb to disarm it? What? To be a hero.

[knowing he's not convincing Hardy]
Why do you do this job, Hardy?
I don't know... you?re gonna tell me, right?
Because you like it. We?re all a little twisted here... You love it but that fuck craves it.

[Talking to Weldon about how to find the bomber]
Just keep checking those UDT lists.
Were checking... and do you know whose name keeps coming up... you

[starting to see where he is going with this comment]
I guess that means i'm qualified.
Sometimes i just don't know where the fuck your coming from.

[annoyed]
If you give me a reason...

[calmily and cleverly trying to push him]
Fuck you Weldon...
